verses.1: Topa tungah lungdamna ko-in, ama min phat unla, ama sepnate khempeuh mite lakah kitheisak un.
verses.2: Ama tungah la sa un. Ama tungah phatna la sa unla, a lamdang a septe khempeuh gen ciat ta un.
verses.3: Ama min siangtho hangin lungdam unla, Topa a zong mite lungdam tahen.
verses.4: Topa le ama huh ding zon belin nei unla, a tawntungin ama maipha zong niloh un.
verses.5: No ama nasem, Abrahamʼ suanlekhak, Jakobʼ tate, ama teel mite aw, ama sep sa a lamdang nate, ama nalamdang lahte, a genkhiat a thukhennate phawk ciat ta un!
verses.7: Amah pen Topa, eiteʼ Pasian hi a, ama thupiaknate leitung khempeuh in a zuih ding ahi hi.
verses.8: “Na luah dingin Kanaan gam kong pia ding hi,” ci-in Abraham tawh thuciam a bawl sa, Isaac tungah a thuciam sa, Jakob tungah thupiakna a kipsak, Israel tungah tawntung thuciamna, ama thupiak sa kammal, ama thuciamna pen khang tul khat dongin amah in phawk ngitnget hi.
verses.12: Amaute tawm mahmah in, bangmah gentham lo uh a, khualmi hi-in,
verses.13: minam khat panin minam dang khat ah, gam khat pan gam khat ah a vak kawikawi laitakun,
verses.14: amah in amaute kuamah nengniamsak lo hi. Amauteʼ hangin amah in kumpite thuhilhin,
verses.15: “Ka sathau nilhte su kha kei un; ka kamsangte tungah siatna bawl kei un,” ci hi.
verses.16: Amah in leitungah kialpi tungsakin, nek theih an khempeuh a siatsak ciangin,
verses.17: amah in, Josef a kici, sila-a a kizuak mi khat, amauteʼ mai ah a sawl hi.
verses.18: Ama khete pen kolte in nasak a, ama ngawng pen sikkol sungah kikoih hi.
verses.19: Ama thugente a tun matengin Topa in amah ze-et hi.
verses.20: Amah a khah khia dingin kumpipa in mi paisak a, mihingte a ukpa in amah a khah khia hi.
verses.21: Josef in kumpipaʼ uliante ama ut bangin lamlakin, a upate pen pilna hilhsak a, ama inn sung topa ama neihsa khempeuh a ukpa-in a koih hi.
verses.23: Tua ciangin Egypt gamah Israel va pai a, Hamʼ gam sungah peemta-in Jakob va om hi.
verses.24: Topa in ama mite pungsak mahmah a, a galte sangin amaute hatsak zaw hi.
verses.25: Ama mite mudahin, ama nasemte siamna tawh a khem dingin amauteʼ lungsim amah in kiheisak hi.
verses.26: Amah in, ama nasem Moses le ama teel sa Aaron a sawl hi.
verses.27: Amaute in ama limte amauteʼ lakah nalamdangte Hamʼ gam sungah a bawl uh hi.
verses.28: Amah in khuamial sawl a, leitung khim a zingsak hi. Ahih hangin Egypt mite in ama thu a langpang uh hi.
verses.29: Amah in amauʼ tuite sisan suaksak a, a ngasate uh a sisak hi.
verses.30: Amauʼ leitang tung le a kumpipaʼ inn sung nangawn uiphukte tawh a kidim hi.
verses.31: Amah kampau a, tho honpi le thokangte gam sung dimin hong om hi.
verses.32: Amah in a guah dingun gialpi, amauʼ gam sung khempeuh a taangsak khuaphialep, amaute a pia hi.
verses.33: Amah in amauʼ leengguite le a theikungte uh vat tansak a, amauʼ gam sung sing khempeuh a kuaihtansak hi.
verses.34: Amah kampau a, kauphete le tangngolte, sim zawh lohin hong pai uh a,
verses.35: gam sunga kung khempeuh, amauʼ leitang panin a gah khempeuh a nektumsak mang hi.
verses.36: Amauʼ sung pan a piang masa Egypt tacil khempeuh a sat lum hi.
verses.37: Tua ciangin amah in ngun le kham tawh Israel-te paikhiatpih a, amaute a vekpi-in cidamin thahat kim uh hi.
verses.38: Amaute a paikhiat ciangun Egypt mite lungdam mahmah uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute kihta uh hi.
verses.39: Amaute a liah dingin amah in meiipi kaisak a, zanin khua muh nadingin mei a omsak hi.
verses.40: Amaute in ngen a, vantung panin anlum tampi a pia hi.
verses.41: Amah in suangpi hong a, tui a phul khia hi. Gun tui bangin sehnel gamah tui a luang hi.
verses.42: Bang hang hiam cih leh a siangtho ama thuciamna le ama nasem Abraham a phawk hi.
verses.43: Tua ahih ciangin ama mite lungdamna tawh, ama teel mite lasakna tawh a paikhiatpih hi.
verses.44: Amaute in ama ngeina kipte zui-in, ama thukhamte a neih theih nadingun, amah in amaute tungah minam dangteʼ leitang pia a, midangteʼ nasepna gahte zong amaute a ngahsak hi. Topa phat un.
